All right. Let's sum up!
The objects for hunting are living in the depths of the Ice Maze Maze Buffalo, Frozen Buffalo, Cubs Ursus, Ursus, and Maze Yeti Yeti Frost. Start hunting for these creatures and obtain buffalo meat, Meat and Meat Ursus Yeti . Yes, to 30 pieces of meat each. All this take it to the castle Schuttgart Vishotskomu captain. To perform the job you time to go to the Ice Maze. You all right? Long live the journey!...
